reviewText: I ordered this for my Mom because she loves the show.  She watches them over and over again and enjoys them each and every time!  Such a good family show!

Touched by an Angel has a beautiful message, and it shares it in a special way. This is a great season of the show, and it has some amazing episodes (like "An Angel by Any Other Name," for example!). Touched by an Angel is likely my favorite TV series of all time. Like everyone else, I too am anxiously awaiting the release of the rest of the series!

I bought this for my mom's birthday because this is one of her favorite shows of all time.

Outside: Beautiful cover art, great discs and DVD cases, includes Spanish track (which is a must for us because my mom knows very little English)

Inside: Even though my mom is not a very religious person, she tells me that every time she watches Touched by an Angel she feels an internal peace that no other show gives her.

She loves the DVDs and I'm very pleased with this product because she's happy :)
the movies touches the heart couldn't wait for the fourth season.  I can just put myself right in the pictures as they play and I cry through everyone of them please keep them coming.
I am extremly satisfied withmthis product. What makes it more special is that I know Chis Burke and Jason Kingsley thru my work.
The product arrived in time for Christmas.  We haven't had a chance to watch this video set yet, but have enjoyed previous seasons of Touched by an Angel.
My husband and I are watching this series one show a night durning the long winter when nothing is on TV. Great entertainment when you don't want to watch violance that is in other shows out there.

My mother and I loved this series. So when they started issuing DVD seasons, I began collecting for my Mom's birthdays and Christmas presents. Because she loves them so much she got one season as a Mother's Day gift also. I can hardly wait to get the rest for her..
Best TV Series ever made for Television.  Need I say more?  Oh yea, I give it a "Celestial" rating, 1 billion stars.

My husband refers to this as my "Boo-Hoo" show because I always cry when they state they are angels. It was such a beautiful show, encompassing not just the Christian religion, but all religions. God is always referred to as "The One True God". Some of the shows hit right on target such as "Monica Has A Bad Day". That show was all about how one act by one person can touch off a string of events, either good or not. You can watch the show with young children. My children will make fun of it at times ( after all teenagers have to be cool) yet will sit and watch. My grown daughters when all come to my house at once settle in with snacks and we will watch episode after episode. I do not think there are any shows now that portray anything like this. And Della Reese, I love her and would like to see her on something now, she is such a warm person. Whoever had the idea for this show BRAVO it was wonderful.
thank you for this wonderful gift. This will make a great and wonderful gift family/ friend enjoyed and will enjoy watchingGre
A+ Highly Recommend. Very fast turn around time and was in my mail box before I even realized it!  I would purchase from this person again!

I have purchased The first, second, third and fourth season of Touched by an Angel.

I enjoy watching the videos that a provide a glimpse of problems people are facing and sometimes when all seems lost, an Angel helps the person(s) realize that there is a way through prayer to make their life better.

I hope that CBS will release additional seasons of Touched by an Angel since so many customers have expressed interest in purchasing Seasons 5 - 9.
I really did like the "Touched By an Angel" series.  It's inspiratonal always and gives me a lift and it's done so very well.
Have been waiting for the price to come down on this- it finally did and I purchased it.  Already had Season 1 &2.
I love this series, and this one is great. I only wished they would release Seasons 5-9. This is great to add to home collections. LOVE IT

I have purchased the other 3 seasons and this one by far is the best.  The episodes include more of individual angels than the others.  There are some with Andrew where you really get to know him better.
There are some challenging politically charged subjects as well such as homosexuality/aids, tobacco companies being sued, and dishonest journalism.
Enjoy!

Love, love, love this series!  Too bad it was taken off TV.  Waiting for other seasons to be released.  Great item to add to collection and watch over and over again.  Wonderful Saturday night TV time with the grandchildren.

THIS SERIES DON'T NEED ANY INTRODUCTION,IN STANDS ON THE TITLE ALONG.A+++++++++ IS AN UNDERSTATEMENT WHEN IT PERTAINS TO MONA & TESS & ANDREW AND THE MOST HEART TUGGING CAN'T HELP BUT CRY EPISODES.IT'S AN ALL TIME FAVORITE RIGHT UP THERE WITH HIGHWAY TO HEAVEN & LITTLE HOUSE ON THE PRAIRIE,WHICH I OWN.SHOULD BE IN EVERYONE'S HOME.
Words cannot express my love for Touched by an Angel.  I was so sorry when it left the air.  I have every season that has been released and want more.  I love this series

There are not eight discs on this set there are only four and only 16 episodes instead of at least 24 ..this is an incomplete set and we should get our money back or send every customer the additional eight or more seasons that we didn't receive
The center that hold the disc in place was broken but other than that it works fine
This DVD set is exactly as I expected. New in packaging, entire third season!
Item was as described. Happy with purchase.
Fantastic!
Love this series
top notch
I love Roma Downy and the cast. Great show.

I would of giving a higher rating if it had closed caption as well. I don't know if I will buy the rest of the seasons because of that issue.
On the plus side it nice to see hope&reassurance that good thing happened all the time. It's called faith!

I only saw Touched by an angel for the first time several months ago (it's 2013, people), but now I can't get enough of it. It really is a feel-good show, and unlike anything else I've ever seen on air. I hate violence on t.v. I just won't watch it. You can be sure that 1. None of these shows are violent. 2. Watching these shows will actually make you feel better about humanity. 3. It really is inspirational; it will make you want to do something kind for someone else.
Anyway, I have seen all the seasons available on video, and this one is my favorite. The guest stars are great.
